Uses of Class
edu.mines.jtk.mesh.TriSurf.Face

  • Packages that use TriSurf.Face 
    Package Description
    edu.mines.jtk.mesh
    Unstructured meshs of triangles and tetrahedra.

    • Uses of TriSurf.Face in edu.mines.jtk.mesh

      Methods in edu.mines.jtk.mesh that return TriSurf.Face 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Face.faceA()
      Returns the face nabor A (opposite node A) referenced by this face.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Face.faceB()
      Returns the face nabor B (opposite node B) referenced by this face.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Face.faceC()
      Returns the face nabor C (opposite node C) referenced by this face.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Edge.faceLeft() 
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Face.faceNabor(TriSurf.Node node)
      Gets the face nabor opposite the specified node.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Edge.faceRight() 
      TriSurf.Face[] TriSurf.FaceList.faces()
      Returns (by reference) the array of faces in this list.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.findFace(TriSurf.Node node)
      Returns a face that references the specified node.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.findFace(TriSurf.Node node1, TriSurf.Node node2)
      Returns a face that references the specified nodes.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.findFace(TriSurf.Node node1, TriSurf.Node node2, TriSurf.Node node3)
      Returns a face that references the specified nodes.
      TriSurf.Face[] TriSurf.getFaceNabors(TriSurf.Node node)
      Gets an array of face nabors of the specified node.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.Face.mate()
      Returns the mate of this face.
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.FaceIterator.next() 
      TriSurf.Face TriSurf.FaceList.remove(int index)
      Removes the face with specified index from this list.
      TriSurf.Face[] TriSurf.FaceList.trim()
      Facems this list so that its array length equals the number of faces.
      Methods in edu.mines.jtk.mesh with parameters of type TriSurf.Face 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TriSurf.FaceList.add(TriSurf.Face face)
      Appends the specified face to this list.
      TriSurf.Node TriSurf.Face.nodeNabor(TriSurf.Face faceNabor)
      Gets the node in the specified face nabor that is opposite this face.
